snippet: The euro currency can survive 2012, Christine Lagarde, the managing director of the International Monetary Fund, told reporters in South Africa, Reuters reported.
abstract: The euro currency can survive 2012, Christine Lagarde, the managing director of the International Monetary Fund, told reporters in South Africa, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The euro currency can survive 2012, Christine Lagarde, the managing director of the International Monetary Fund, told reporters in South Africa, Reuters reported. "Will 2012 be the end of the euro currency? I seriously don't think so. It's a young currency, it's a solid one as well," she said. Read more »
